mapper.insert: insert into folder(ownerId, parentFolder, folderName, createDate) values(#{ownerId}, #{parentFolder}, #{folderName},#{createDate})
mapper.update: update folder set folderName = #{updateFolderName} where folderId = #{folderId}
mapper.select: select folderId, ownerId, parentFolder, folderName, createDate from folder where folderId = #{id};
